article_title: UCSF to open $1.5 billion, eco-friendly medical complex

Credible, Defensible Estimates In healthcare, every interaction with the patient matters. Especially in today’s environment of continuous improvement, efforts have been concentrated on coordination among providers, the patient care experience and quality outcomes – all laudable goals.

og.description: Construction is all but done at the University of California San Francisco Medical Center, with a grand opening for the $1.5 billion complex slated for Feb 1. It's the high-tech touches that really set apart this renovation.
og.title: UCSF to open $1.5 billion, eco-friendly medical complex on Feb. 1

twitter.description: Construction is all but done at the University of California San Francisco Medical Center, with a grand opening for the $1.5 billion complex slated for Feb 1. It's the high-tech touches that really set apart this renovation.
twitter.title: UCSF to open $1.5 billion, eco-friendly medical complex on Feb. 1

article_metadata.description: Construction is all but done at the University of California San Francisco Medical Center, with a grand opening for the $1.5 billion complex slated for Feb 1, officials said. The complex includes the UCSF Benioff Children’s Hospital San Francisco, UCSF Betty Irene Moore Women’s Hospital and UCSF Bakar Cancer Hospital, with a total of 289 beds on the 60.2-acre campus.
